message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  How about $95?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  $105 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and go with $100?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up on my original target price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $108.
